America, Dedicated to Those who wish to Sheathe the Desolating Sword of War And to Restore the Blessings of Peace and Amity to a divided People.
America, Dedicated to Those who wish to Sheathe the Desolating Sword of War And to Restore the Blessings of Peace and Amity to a divided People.
Robert Edge Pine, artist, and Joseph Strutt, engraver. After a 1778 painting by Pine. Painting destroyed by fire in 1803.
